    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_769972e6ff26f2803c5a6b0d09b197a79c86a6fc</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_769972e6ff26f2803c5a6b0d09b197a79c86a6fc</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Relative intensities of radiation from the Sun received by the Earth's atmosphere and surface</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relative Intensität der Strahlung von der Sonne 
empfangen durch der die Atmosphäre und Oberfläche Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Intensités relatives de rayonnement du soleil 
reçu par l'atmosphère et la surface de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Intensidades relativas da radiação do sol 
recebido pela atmosfera e pela superfície da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Intensità relative di radiazione dal sole ricevuto
dall'atmosfera e dalla superficie della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχετικές εντάσεις της ακτινοβολίας από τον ήλιο που 
παραλαμβάνεται από τη γήινες ατμόσφαιρα και την επιφάνεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Intensidades relativas de la radiación del sol 
recibido por la atmósfera y la superficie de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These line graphs compare the variation of relative intensities of Sun's radiation reaching the Earth's atmosphere (curve A) and the Earth's surface (curve B) for different wavelengths.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radiations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">relative intensities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses vergleichen Zeile Diagramme die Variante 
der relativen Intensität der Strahlung des Sonnen die Atmosphäre der
Masse (Kurve A) und die Oberfläche der Masse (Kurve B) erreichend 
für unterschiedliche Wellenlängen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces graphes par ligne comparent la variation des 
intensités relatives du rayonnement du soleil atteignant 
l'atmosphère de la terre (courbe A) et la surface de la terre (courbe
B) pour différentes longueurs d'onde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este a linha gráficos compara a variação das 
intensidades relativas da radiação do sun que alcançam a atmosfera 
da terra (curva A) e a superfície da terra (curva B) para wavelengths
diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafici lineari confronta la variazione 
delle intensità relative di radiazione del sun che raggiungono 
l'atmosfera della terra (curva A) e la superficie della terra (curva 
B) per le lunghezze d'onda differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι γραφικές παραστάσεις γραμμών συγκρίνουν την 
παραλλαγή των σχετικών εντάσεων της ακτινοβολίας του ήλιου που 
φθάνει στη γήινη ατμόσφαιρα (καμπύλη Α) και η γήινη επιφάνεια 
(καμπύλη Β) για τα διαφορετικά μήκη κύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este la línea gráficos compara la variación de 
intensidades relativas de la radiación del sun que alcanzan la 
atmósfera de la tierra (curva A) y la superficie de la tierra (curva 
B) para diversas longitudes de onda.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">relative Intensität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oberfläche</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">intensidades relativas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sol</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
